root: ^Helvezia honey, is this you? CAN YOU HEAR ME??
^Yes Nana I can hear you, what’s up?
^My email isn’t working, I need your help.
^Can’t you ask Grandpa? I really don’t have time for this!
^There was an icon on my screen that I used to click but it disappeared. I need to send Ruth a picture of the scarf I knit.
^You know she has a very handsome grandson. You two would get on like a house on fire!
^Grandma I’m not looking for love, I’m still far too young to settle down.
^Okay Nana listen, first of all I don’t need your help finding a boyfriend, second of all I’m happily single.
^Why not, I’m having the worst luck with men lately.

G1: ^That’s what you say now but soon you’re going to be all wrinkles and creaking bones!
G2: ^Helvezia Maria Geneva, how dare you speak to me like that?!
G3: ^You need to check your attitude, young lady.
Continue1: ^No matter, we shan’t be speaking about it right now. I just don’t want you to end up like aunt Linda.
^She was eaten by all her cats. Do you want that Helvezia? Do you?!
^I like cats Nana, if they eat me that’s on me for slipping.
G4: ^Alright dear, I will have to let you go now, your grandpa needs me.
G5: ^My goodness Helvezia! This is no way to talk to your grandma!
^No, absolutely not, stay away from me you wretched woman!
^Don’t be like that Sike, you’re hardly even bruised anymore.
^I won’t tell you anything unless you pay!
^We’ll see about that, now won’t we.
